pr_title: Remove automatic production deployment of bots.

timeline.message:
Remove automatic production deployment of bots.

This update removes travis automatic production deployments
and updates documentation instructing bot deployments to be
done by hand.

Observing the lobby, games freeze and bots crash all the time.
A crash coincided with a stalled production deployemnt. The UFW
operations are concerning, we need to test more thoroughly that
an idempotent no-op production deployment can be safely done
while players are connected.

timeline.author: codeclimate
